guide.introduction:
Our FiberPRO Bobby Parks Discusses Current Decking Trends and Consumer Spending

FiberPro and Owner of Peachtree Decks & Porches Bobby Parks shares deck trends from this year and his current observations of consumer spending.Fiberon Composite Decking

Our FiberPRO Bobby Parks Discusses Current Decking Trends and Consumer Spending

FiberPro and Owner of Peachtree Decks & Porches Bobby Parks shares deck trends from this year and his current observations of consumer spending.Fiberon Composite Decking
guide.summary: Have you seen business pick up after the summer months? How do you anticipate business being next year? Share your thoughts below, thanks!
guide.title: Deck Trends: Bobby Parks on Business Trends and Consumer Spending
